content.query:
USE nyc_taxi_ldw
GO

CREATE OR ALTER PROCEDURE silver.usp_usp_silver_trip_type
AS
BEGIN
IF OBJECT_ID('silver.trip_type') IS NOT NULL DROP EXTERNAL TABLE silver.trip_type


CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE silver.trip_type
    WITH (
        data_source = nyc_taxi_src,
        location = 'silver/trip_type',
        file_format = parquet_file_format
    )
AS
SELECT *
    from bronze.trip_type;

END;
